HDG.LOG.content: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: [lays what is present before into presence] > all disclosure releases (Entbergen enthebt) what is present from concealment [Lacan, return of repressed] > forgetting as a reservoir to draw from [aletheia, trace]

HDG.LOG.content: Heraclitus: en does/does not want to be called by name Zeus [can’t we say the same for Being?]
HDG.LOG.linkedContent: Heraclitus: en does/does not want to be called by name Zeus [can’t we say the same for Being?]

HDG.BC.content: for inception of our history [contra will of modern technology], for Greeks, decline was unique, momentary, laudable, great > decline of unique vs. perishing, clinging fast to the ordinary > what is imperishable [indestructible] in inception: rarity/singularity of each varied return of what is originary w/in it > experience of inception: realize what essentially came to be known at inception itself > the thought-worthy [value]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: for inception of our history [contra will of modern technology], for Greeks, decline was unique, momentary, laudable, great > decline of unique vs. perishing, clinging fast to the ordinary > what is imperishable [indestructible] in inception: rarity/singularity of each varied return of what is originary w/in it > experience of inception: realize what essentially came to be known at inception itself > the thought-worthy [value]

HDG.BC.content: for Plato, being most authentic being; for Nietzsche, being as most negative [no!] > Plato/Nietzsche part of same interpretation (doctrine of Western metaphysics): being is the most universal of the universal (koinotaton)
HDG.BC.linkedContent: for Plato, being most authentic being; for Nietzsche, being as most negative [no!] > Plato/Nietzsche part of same interpretation (doctrine of Western metaphysics): being is the most universal of the universal (koinotaton)

HDG.BC.content: guidewords (Leitworte) > being is emptiest at same time surplus (Überfluss) > “is” indicates emptiness (Leere) (reflection [Nachdenken] can find no support [Anhalt]) & wealth (Reichtum) w/in which Being of beings pronounces (ausspricht) itself > w/ “is,” a surplus put into words [is this different w/ any other word? transcendental signifier]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: guidewords (Leitworte) > being is emptiest at same time surplus (Überfluss) > “is” indicates emptiness (Leere) (reflection [Nachdenken] can find no support [Anhalt]) & wealth (Reichtum) w/in which Being of beings pronounces (ausspricht) itself > w/ “is,” a surplus put into words [is this different w/ any other word? transcendental signifier]

HDG.BC.content: to be equivalent (Gleiche) something other/additional (mehreres) is needed [Marx & commodity] > to be the same (Selbe), only uniqueness is needed > as the same & unique, Being is forever different from/in itself (but different not in the sense of twice over, repeatedly (mehrmal), or able to be split into multiplicity), incomparable distinction
HDG.BC.linkedContent: to be equivalent (Gleiche) something other/additional (mehreres) is needed [Marx & commodity] > to be the same (Selbe), only uniqueness is needed > as the same & unique, Being is forever different from/in itself (but different not in the sense of twice over, repeatedly (mehrmal), or able to be split into multiplicity), incomparable distinction

HDG.BC.content: Nothing “is” turns Nothing into a being? > Nothing doesn’t need beings but it needs Being > perhaps Nothing is the same as Being, it is unique & incomparable: its essence as incontrovertibly incomparable belongs to Being, confirms Being’s uniqueness
HDG.BC.linkedContent: Nothing “is” turns Nothing into a being? > Nothing doesn’t need beings but it needs Being > perhaps Nothing is the same as Being, it is unique & incomparable: its essence as incontrovertibly incomparable belongs to Being, confirms Being’s uniqueness

HDG.BC.content: beings always have their equal [Being] > Being is incomparable, unique, always the Same, a sameness that doesn’t exclude differences [indifference point] > no various Being, can’t break up into multiple/numerous [dissemination vs. plurivocity]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: beings always have their equal [Being] > Being is incomparable, unique, always the Same, a sameness that doesn’t exclude differences [indifference point] > no various Being, can’t break up into multiple/numerous [dissemination vs. plurivocity]

HDG.BC.content: [indifference point not dialectical sublation] Hegel could never say “Actuality” and nothing are the same, though he does realize both are most extreme abstractions of “actuality” > attend to the following only in passing [?]: Nothing presences, not the nullity people apply to it > when Nothing rests on fancy, mere play of understanding, the emptiest & the unique [just like Being] > Nothing not a nullity (for us): horror towards devastation, recoiling in terror of annihilation: shrinking back from something that can’t be addressed as mere imagination or something baseless
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [indifference point not dialectical sublation] Hegel could never say “Actuality” and nothing are the same, though he does realize both are most extreme abstractions of “actuality” > attend to the following only in passing [?]: Nothing presences, not the nullity people apply to it > when Nothing rests on fancy, mere play of understanding, the emptiest & the unique [just like Being] > Nothing not a nullity (for us): horror towards devastation, recoiling in terror of annihilation: shrinking back from something that can’t be addressed as mere imagination or something baseless

HDG.BC.content: what if Nothing is same as Being? Being something horrifying/dreadful, something that assails us [annihilation of trace?] > [is this why we become indifferent to Being, why we flee to reassurance via the “self-understood”? Mitsein]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: what if Nothing is same as Being? Being something horrifying/dreadful, something that assails us [annihilation of trace?] > [is this why we become indifferent to Being, why we flee to reassurance via the “self-understood”? Mitsein]

HDG.BC.content: [practice, method, askesis] justifications for attempt meaningless if attempt at such remembrance not carried out: remembering return into 1st inception of Western thinking brings w/ it all signs of violence [risk the worst?]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [practice, method, askesis] justifications for attempt meaningless if attempt at such remembrance not carried out: remembering return into 1st inception of Western thinking brings w/ it all signs of violence [risk the worst?]

HDG.BC.content: [answers question on p. 66?] doesn’t such reflection upon Being run counter to every natural self-consciousness of man? animal rationale doesn’t exclude possibility to expand consideration of man [same goes for your arguments]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: [answers question on p. 66?] doesn’t such reflection upon Being run counter to every natural self-consciousness of man? animal rationale doesn’t exclude possibility to expand consideration of man [same goes for your arguments]

HDG.W.content: what is more truly worthy [of poet’s thought, of thought] than word’s being veiling itself, the fading word for the word > oldest word for rule of word: logos—the same word, word for Saying, is word for Being, the presencing of beings
HDG.W.linkedContent: what is more truly worthy [of poet’s thought, of thought] than word’s being veiling itself, the fading word for the word > oldest word for rule of word: logos—the same word, word for Saying, is word for Being, the presencing of beings

HDG.WM.content: nothing awakens for 1st time proper formulation of metaphysical question re: Being of beings > nothing not as indeterminate opposite of beings, unveils itself as belonging to Being of beings > agrees w/ Hegel’s “Pure Being and pure Nothing are therefore the same” [also quoted in HDG.BC]
HDG.WM.linkedContent: nothing awakens for 1st time proper formulation of metaphysical question re: Being of beings > nothing not as indeterminate opposite of beings, unveils itself as belonging to Being of beings > agrees w/ Hegel’s “Pure Being and pure Nothing are therefore the same” [also quoted in HDG.BC]

HDG.WM.content: Being is finite [?] > nothing & Being belong together [are the same] because being itself is essentially finite, manifests itself only in transcendence of a Dasein held out into the nothing
HDG.WM.linkedContent: Being is finite [?] > nothing & Being belong together [are the same] because being itself is essentially finite, manifests itself only in transcendence of a Dasein held out into the nothing

HDG.IWM.content: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: via time as preliminary name Being is unconcealed, concealed essence of time speaks in first metaphysical names for Being & in its last name: “eternal recurrence of the same” [EROS] [is Being a metaphysical name for Being?]

HDG.IWM.content: “understanding”: relation that tries to enter into relation of truth of Being to human essence, ecstatic, thrown projection, standing in realm of the open > realm that opens for us in projection is called meaning > “Meaning of Being” says same as “truth of Being” [not identical?]
HDG.IWM.linkedContent: “understanding”: relation that tries to enter into relation of truth of Being to human essence, ecstatic, thrown projection, standing in realm of the open > realm that opens for us in projection is called meaning > “Meaning of Being” says same as “truth of Being” [not identical?]

HDG.QB.content: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: [responding to Jünger on whether one doesn’t need certain concepts—only comprehension of an actuality] our concern not only w/ concepts of science but w/ fundamental words like Gestalt, domination (Herrschaft), representation (Repräsentation), power, will, value, security (Sicherheit), presence (Praesenz) (presencing [Anwesen]), nothing > fundamental words (Grundworten) of thinking are an other kind than metaphysical concepts > in latter: that which concepts (Begriffen) grasp (begreifen) same as this very grasping (Begreifen) [strange phrasing on the difference btwn forgetting fundamental words and using them unexamined]

HDG.QB.content: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation
HDG.QB.linkedContent: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation

HDG.QB.content: presencing (“being”) always presencing directed toward human essence, presencing as a call (Geheiss) that calls upon human essence > human essence as such is a hearing, belongs to calling of this call, the approach of presencing > that which is the Same (“being”?) each time: belonging together of call & hearing—“What am I saying? It is no longer ‘being’ at all” [beyond Being] > relinquish isolating/separating word “being” just as decisively as name “human being” [can never call human being and being same] [hermeneutic circle leads beyond Being, beyond itself?]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: presencing (“being”) always presencing directed toward human essence, presencing as a call (Geheiss) that calls upon human essence > human essence as such is a hearing, belongs to calling of this call, the approach of presencing > that which is the Same (“being”?) each time: belonging together of call & hearing—“What am I saying? It is no longer ‘being’ at all” [beyond Being] > relinquish isolating/separating word “being” just as decisively as name “human being” [can never call human being and being same] [hermeneutic circle leads beyond Being, beyond itself?]

HDG.QB.content: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)
HDG.QB.linkedContent: by no means easier to say “being” than to speak of the nothing > shows how once more, inevitably, everything depends (ankommt) on correct saying (rechte Sagen), the logos whose essence logic/dialectic of metaphysics can never experience > is it due to “being” (as Same) that our saying fails? all too readily suspected as so-called “mysticism”? > [beyond Being, Derrida] would the crossing of the line leave language of fundamental words to whim of those who are speaking? enough for language to be universally comprehensible? or do other [uniquely unique] laws/measures prevail here [totally other]? (these questions are scarcely beginning to become worthy of question—to feel home in them)

HDG.QB.content: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: what is the Ort of the nothing? > thinking continually led around/chased around the Same as though a magical circle, w/out ever being able to approach this Same [beyond Being] > “good definition” of nihilism points us toward realm that demands a different saying (anderes Sagen) [totally other?] > if turning belongs to “Being,” so that latter resides (beruht) in former, then “Being” dissolves [auflösen] into the turning [logic of exemplarity] > [the first] X Being, initially to prevent “Being” from being a being that then stands face-to-face w/ human (Being not independent from human being) [Being needs human]

HDG.QB.content: like X Being, nothing would also have to be written [differance, writing], thought in same way, human essence belongs to nothing in its thoughtful commemoration, human being essentially participates in nihilism, he himself is this zone & line [re: overcoming nihilism]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: like X Being, nothing would also have to be written [differance, writing], thought in same way, human essence belongs to nothing in its thoughtful commemoration, human being essentially participates in nihilism, he himself is this zone & line [re: overcoming nihilism]

HDG.QB.content: for Jünger, reduction characteristic of nihilistic trends; for Heidegger, reduction w/in Beings rests in a production of Being: unfolding of will to power into unconditional will to will [using destiny to affirm fuzzy assessments of an epoch] > the disappearance (Schwund) (absence) determined out of/through a presence (Praesenz), such presence precedes/surpasses all that disappears [nihilism & metaphysics as same destiny, Nietzsche]
HDG.QB.linkedContent: for Jünger, reduction characteristic of nihilistic trends; for Heidegger, reduction w/in Beings rests in a production of Being: unfolding of will to power into unconditional will to will [using destiny to affirm fuzzy assessments of an epoch] > the disappearance (Schwund) (absence) determined out of/through a presence (Praesenz), such presence precedes/surpasses all that disappears [nihilism & metaphysics as same destiny, Nietzsche]

HDG.QB.content: surpassing (Überstieg) is metaphysics itself, not a doctrine, but fact that such surpassing is “given” > given in sense of brought onto path of its prevailing, destined > destiny of (objective genitive [control genitive]) metaphysics: incalculable fullness/suddenness (unberechenbare Fülle und Jähe) of what unfolds as surpassing > acc. this destiny, human representation (Vorstellen) itself becomes metaphysical > the surpassing that returns to beings, “the transcendens pure & simple,” is “the being” of beings
HDG.QB.linkedContent: surpassing (Überstieg) is metaphysics itself, not a doctrine, but fact that such surpassing is “given” > given in sense of brought onto path of its prevailing, destined > destiny of (objective genitive [control genitive]) metaphysics: incalculable fullness/suddenness (unberechenbare Fülle und Jähe) of what unfolds as surpassing > acc. this destiny, human representation (Vorstellen) itself becomes metaphysical > the surpassing that returns to beings, “the transcendens pure & simple,” is “the being” of beings

HDG.QB.content: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”
HDG.QB.linkedContent: recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics is recovery of oblivion of Being, recovery turns (Verwindung wendet sich) toward essence of metaphysics > in order to respond to recovery must first clarify essence of metaphysics [not yet there? Destruction still required?] > “in this recovery, the enduring truth (bleibende Wahrheit) of metaphysics that has seemingly been rejected first returns explicitly (kehrt erst eigens zurück) as the now appropriated (angeeignetes) essence of metaphysics”

HDG.QB.content: why do beings have priority w/out us giving thought to “not” of beings > if metaphysics thinks Being of beings (transcendens, the surpassing) can it also think “not” of beings, that nothing that is equioriginally the Same as Being?
HDG.QB.linkedContent: why do beings have priority w/out us giving thought to “not” of beings > if metaphysics thinks Being of beings (transcendens, the surpassing) can it also think “not” of beings, that nothing that is equioriginally the Same as Being?

HDG.FS.content: xynon means same as koinon? > for Heraclitus, xynienai: going together; koinon merely katholon, the universal, i.e. “what belongs equally to all despite differences” [a going together that’s not the universal common] > co-belonging of xynon is differing (verschieden) (to diapheromenon), this alone can bring together (zusammenbringen): no night alone, no day alone, co-belonging of day/night (their very being) [not dialectic?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: xynon means same as koinon? > for Heraclitus, xynienai: going together; koinon merely katholon, the universal, i.e. “what belongs equally to all despite differences” [a going together that’s not the universal common] > co-belonging of xynon is differing (verschieden) (to diapheromenon), this alone can bring together (zusammenbringen): no night alone, no day alone, co-belonging of day/night (their very being) [not dialectic?]

HDG.FS.content: adverb aei, “always already”: more eternal than everlasting (former does not dominate time [w/ presence?])
HDG.FS.linkedContent: adverb aei, “always already”: more eternal than everlasting (former does not dominate time [w/ presence?])

HDG.FS.content: what is the Same in which day passes to night? the en, the unity, other name for Being? world, light, space, time, etc.—all too general (allgemeinen)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: what is the Same in which day passes to night? the en, the unity, other name for Being? world, light, space, time, etc.—all too general (allgemeinen)

HDG.FS.content: experience of rift (Riss) only possible in certain “return to” unity
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of rift (Riss) only possible in certain “return to” unity

HDG.FS.content: what sort of positing is that by which Absolute appears for consciousness? > in Greek, positing is thesis, apothēkē means same as apophansis, let matter stand here from itself, as it is, i.e. presences (anwest) > modern positing, however, is closest to Latin repraesentatio, the re- refers back to ego cogito, re- as “back to me,” thus that which stands becomes object (all this covered over by presumptions of idealism)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: what sort of positing is that by which Absolute appears for consciousness? > in Greek, positing is thesis, apothēkē means same as apophansis, let matter stand here from itself, as it is, i.e. presences (anwest) > modern positing, however, is closest to Latin repraesentatio, the re- refers back to ego cogito, re- as “back to me,” thus that which stands becomes object (all this covered over by presumptions of idealism)

HDG.FS.content: [Heidegger quotes himself, discusses possibility of using same names inside/outside metaphysics (paleonym)] Humboldt: old coin w/ new conveyance
HDG.FS.linkedContent: [Heidegger quotes himself, discusses possibility of using same names inside/outside metaphysics (paleonym)] Humboldt: old coin w/ new conveyance

HDG.FS.content: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth
HDG.FS.linkedContent: how same expression can move from metaphysical to non-metaphysical language: 1) inner illumination (innere Erleuchtung), being itself announces itself (sich bekundet), that Dasein unfolds (ausbildet) ein “Seinsverständnis,” Seinsfrage in Sein und Zeit calls for a renewal (Erneuerung) of language 2) favorable external conditions: a) decline (Verfall) and impoverishment (Verarmung) of language [compare to rich language of brothers Grimm] b) fixing of language in computer calculation stops its natural growth

HDG.FS.content: negative (Nichten) vs. denying (Verneinen): Greek distinction ouk and mē? > negating as Greek ouk, then nothing as total nothingness (nihil negativum): beings denied, there are no beings > negating via mē, certain defect re: being > but if being/nothing are same, nothing can’t signify a lack (Fehlen), negating not privative-negative, something other (etwas Anderes), completely specific/unique (ganz und gar Eigenes und Unvergleichliches)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: negative (Nichten) vs. denying (Verneinen): Greek distinction ouk and mē? > negating as Greek ouk, then nothing as total nothingness (nihil negativum): beings denied, there are no beings > negating via mē, certain defect re: being > but if being/nothing are same, nothing can’t signify a lack (Fehlen), negating not privative-negative, something other (etwas Anderes), completely specific/unique (ganz und gar Eigenes und Unvergleichliches)

HDG.FS.content: approach Ereignis by looking at essence of positionality (Ge-stells) > positionality (ambiguous): completion (Vollendung)/consummation (Erfüllung) of metaphysics & (at same time) disclosive preparation (Vorbereitung) of Ereignis, photographic negative of Ereignis
HDG.FS.linkedContent: approach Ereignis by looking at essence of positionality (Ge-stells) > positionality (ambiguous): completion (Vollendung)/consummation (Erfüllung) of metaphysics & (at same time) disclosive preparation (Vorbereitung) of Ereignis, photographic negative of Ereignis

HDG.FS.content: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst
HDG.FS.linkedContent: no destinal (geschickliche) epoch of Ereignis: sending is from enowning (Das Schicken ist aus dem Ereignen) > return to Greeks only has meaning as a return to Being [?] > “step back (Schritt züruck)” (step that retreats [züruckgeht] from metaphysics [overcoming metaphysics]) has sole meaning of enabling (ermöglichen) glance ahead (Vorausblick) to what comes (was kommt) [to-come], thinking begins anew: in essence of technology thought catches sight of heralding portent (verdeckenden Vor-Schein), die verbergende Vor-Erscheinung des Ereignisses selbst

HDG.FS.content: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)
HDG.FS.linkedContent: experience of instancy in clearing of Being, only possible through detour (Umweg) of return to beginning > return occurs in echo of Parmenides, the hearing that opens in our present age (epoch of sending [Schickung] of being as Ge-stell)

HDG.FS.content: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: there is a return to beginning in Being and Time, but it is through destruction, dismantling, disintegration (Auflösung) (which is sometimes awkward [ungeschickt] [?]) of what is destined as being in metaphysics > not yet in Being and Time a genuine knowledge of history of being, hence the awkwardness, naiveté of “ontological destruction” > since then, unavoidable naiveté of novice gave way to a knowing [he arrived, no more destruction?]

HDG.FS.content: in Greek manner, einai means to presence (Greeks speak more revealingly (zeigender)/precisely than we do) [Heidegger’s bias?] > Parmenides’ esti gar einai, genuine tautology: names Same only once, as itself: [fragment 8] “the same dwelling in the same, it lies in itself” [cf. 80 verse is eukuklos, abundant/overflowing, says on its own complete tautology] > in domain of inapparent (Unscheinbaren): presencing itself presences (anwest Anwesen selbst): “great number of indications (Zeignisse) [marks? traces?]…”, indication as sēma, what shows & lets be seen
HDG.FS.linkedContent: in Greek manner, einai means to presence (Greeks speak more revealingly (zeigender)/precisely than we do) [Heidegger’s bias?] > Parmenides’ esti gar einai, genuine tautology: names Same only once, as itself: [fragment 8] “the same dwelling in the same, it lies in itself” [cf. 80 verse is eukuklos, abundant/overflowing, says on its own complete tautology] > in domain of inapparent (Unscheinbaren): presencing itself presences (anwest Anwesen selbst): “great number of indications (Zeignisse) [marks? traces?]…”, indication as sēma, what shows & lets be seen

HDG.MA.content: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws
HDG.MA.linkedContent: meaning pervading technology hides itself > heed that this hidden meaning touches us everywhere (in world of technology), then we stand at once in realm that hides from us, hides in approaching us > essential trait of mystery (Geheimnis): shows itself & at same time withdraws

HDG.CCP.content: transcendental horizonal re-presenting, horizon/transcendence go/pass beyond object, but only relative to object > horizon still something else besides horizon (beyond its appearance as horizon of our representing), this something else is other side of itself, so same as itself
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: transcendental horizonal re-presenting, horizon/transcendence go/pass beyond object, but only relative to object > horizon still something else besides horizon (beyond its appearance as horizon of our representing), this something else is other side of itself, so same as itself

HDG.CCP.content: other side of horizon as a region, enchanted region: “where everything belonging there returns in that in which it rests” > openness as a region, the region of regions, the region
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: other side of horizon as a region, enchanted region: “where everything belonging there returns in that in which it rests” > openness as a region, the region of regions, the region

HDG.CCP.content: things appearing in Gegnet no longer objects, no longer stand opposite us, no longer stand at all > they lie, “rest in the return to the aiding of the expanse of their self-belonging” > there can be rest where rest is the seat/reign of all movement > we can’t really describe what he have named > non, any description would reify it > but, it lets itself be named & thus we can think about it (not representationally) > perhaps we are close to being released into nature of thinking…through waiting for its nature [arrival?]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: things appearing in Gegnet no longer objects, no longer stand opposite us, no longer stand at all > they lie, “rest in the return to the aiding of the expanse of their self-belonging” > there can be rest where rest is the seat/reign of all movement > we can’t really describe what he have named > non, any description would reify it > but, it lets itself be named & thus we can think about it (not representationally) > perhaps we are close to being released into nature of thinking…through waiting for its nature [arrival?]

HDG.CCP.content: waiting (warten) is not awaiting (erwarten): done waiting when we represent what we are waiting for > remaining is a returning > openness itself is Gegnet, into which we’re released by waiting when we think > thinking: coming-into-the-nearness of distance > how come you suddenly could wait?
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: waiting (warten) is not awaiting (erwarten): done waiting when we represent what we are waiting for > remaining is a returning > openness itself is Gegnet, into which we’re released by waiting when we think > thinking: coming-into-the-nearness of distance > how come you suddenly could wait?

HDG.CCP.content: regioning of Gegnet w/ respect to man can’t be same as reigioning of Gegnet w/ respect to things? [cf. 77] > regioning of Gegnet doesn’t cause/effect things or Gelassenheit
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: regioning of Gegnet w/ respect to man can’t be same as reigioning of Gegnet w/ respect to things? [cf. 77] > regioning of Gegnet doesn’t cause/effect things or Gelassenheit

HDG.CCP.content: thing: object = human: ego [ontic/metaphysics had to emerge historically so we could return]
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: thing: object = human: ego [ontic/metaphysics had to emerge historically so we could return]

HDG.CCP.content: coming near & remaining distant from Gegnet > such remaining is a returning > Gegnet would be nearing & distancing > Genet itself: nearness of distance, distance of nearness
HDG.CCP.linkedContent: coming near & remaining distant from Gegnet > such remaining is a returning > Gegnet would be nearing & distancing > Genet itself: nearness of distance, distance of nearness

HDG.DL.content: look for essence of gesture in a beholding that is invisible (unsichtbaren Schauen) [moral image of thought?], bears itself to encounter (entgegenträgt) emptiness (Leere), so that mountains appear > that emptiness same as nothingness, essential being (Wesende) we search to think: the other of all that is present & absent (das Andere zu allem An- und Abwesenden)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: look for essence of gesture in a beholding that is invisible (unsichtbaren Schauen) [moral image of thought?], bears itself to encounter (entgegenträgt) emptiness (Leere), so that mountains appear > that emptiness same as nothingness, essential being (Wesende) we search to think: the other of all that is present & absent (das Andere zu allem An- und Abwesenden)

HDG.DL.content: nature of German language must have come over him like a waterfall (Sturzbach), when Japaner translated “Letter on Humanism,” Hölderlin’s “Homecoming,” Kleist’s Penthesilea and Amphityron > while translating, sensed wellspring of reality (Wesensquell) was the same for the fundamentally different (grundverschiedenen) languages
HDG.DL.linkedContent: nature of German language must have come over him like a waterfall (Sturzbach), when Japaner translated “Letter on Humanism,” Hölderlin’s “Homecoming,” Kleist’s Penthesilea and Amphityron > while translating, sensed wellspring of reality (Wesensquell) was the same for the fundamentally different (grundverschiedenen) languages

HDG.DL.content: Iki: breath of stillness of luminous delight (Entzückens) > delight: what ensnares (Entziehen), carries away (Hinzücken)—into stillness > delight is the same kind as the hint that beckons on, to and fro (des Fort- und Hin- und Her-winkens) > hint is message of the veiling that opens up (lichtenden Verhüllens) > so all presence (Anwesen) has its source in grace (Anmut): pure delight of the calling stillness (rufenden Stille)
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Iki: breath of stillness of luminous delight (Entzückens) > delight: what ensnares (Entziehen), carries away (Hinzücken)—into stillness > delight is the same kind as the hint that beckons on, to and fro (des Fort- und Hin- und Her-winkens) > hint is message of the veiling that opens up (lichtenden Verhüllens) > so all presence (Anwesen) has its source in grace (Anmut): pure delight of the calling stillness (rufenden Stille)

HDG.DL.content: Koto: the happening holding sway (waltende Ereignen) > language as Koto ba: the petals (Blütenblätter) that stem from Koto > wondrous, names something other than Sprache, glossa, lingua, langue > Heidegger the inquirer prefers Sage, saying, probably means the same as “show (zeigen)”: let appear and let shine—but in the manner of hinting > Japaner has arrived home through beckoning hint of Koto ba
HDG.DL.linkedContent: Koto: the happening holding sway (waltende Ereignen) > language as Koto ba: the petals (Blütenblätter) that stem from Koto > wondrous, names something other than Sprache, glossa, lingua, langue > Heidegger the inquirer prefers Sage, saying, probably means the same as “show (zeigen)”: let appear and let shine—but in the manner of hinting > Japaner has arrived home through beckoning hint of Koto ba

HDG.WL.content: [method] speak about speech qua speech (Die Sprache als die Sprache zur Sprache bringen): each Sprache says something different yet the Same > this Same, the oneness that’s the distinctive property of language, holds together (zueinanderhält) what is kept separate (Auseinandergehaltene)
HDG.WL.linkedContent: [method] speak about speech qua speech (Die Sprache als die Sprache zur Sprache bringen): each Sprache says something different yet the Same > this Same, the oneness that’s the distinctive property of language, holds together (zueinanderhält) what is kept separate (Auseinandergehaltene)

HDG.WL.content: if to know means to see something in wholeness of its nature, we can’t see the nature of language as such, in the round, because we belong w/in Saying, can only say something by saying it after Saying > language is monologue [cf. MONL], has its structure in the Aufriss of Saying: 1) language alone speaks authentically 2) language speaks lonesomely (einsam) > the some in lonesome, the same, Greek hama, Gothic sama, thus lonesome: “same in what unites that which belongs together” > Saying is in need of being voiced in word [Being needs man] > man’s needed usage (Brauchen), his resaying (Nachsagen) of what he listens to, lies in that lack (Fehlen) that isn’t negative or defective
HDG.WL.linkedContent: if to know means to see something in wholeness of its nature, we can’t see the nature of language as such, in the round, because we belong w/in Saying, can only say something by saying it after Saying > language is monologue [cf. MONL], has its structure in the Aufriss of Saying: 1) language alone speaks authentically 2) language speaks lonesomely (einsam) > the some in lonesome, the same, Greek hama, Gothic sama, thus lonesome: “same in what unites that which belongs together” > Saying is in need of being voiced in word [Being needs man] > man’s needed usage (Brauchen), his resaying (Nachsagen) of what he listens to, lies in that lack (Fehlen) that isn’t negative or defective

HDG.EC.content: because devastation is deeper, comes from farther away, our thoughts return to it again and again > the devastation of earth, the annihilation (Vernichtung) of human essence: evil itself (das Böse selbst) > evil not as the morally bad, the reprehensible, but as malice (Bösartige)
HDG.EC.linkedContent: because devastation is deeper, comes from farther away, our thoughts return to it again and again > the devastation of earth, the annihilation (Vernichtung) of human essence: evil itself (das Böse selbst) > evil not as the morally bad, the reprehensible, but as malice (Bösartige)

HDG.EC.content: can only think older definition man, mortal, by way of the younger, thinker, so that only common interpretation of zōon logon echon is shallow > we can think logos originally as gathering, human is thus in the gathering toward the originally all-unifying One (auf das urspünglich alles einigende Eine) > in this thought of logos thinking and mortality think the self same (im Grunde das Selbe) > older, like everything inceptual (Anfängliche), harder (schwerer) to think [finitude as thnētos]
HDG.EC.linkedContent: can only think older definition man, mortal, by way of the younger, thinker, so that only common interpretation of zōon logon echon is shallow > we can think logos originally as gathering, human is thus in the gathering toward the originally all-unifying One (auf das urspünglich alles einigende Eine) > in this thought of logos thinking and mortality think the self same (im Grunde das Selbe) > older, like everything inceptual (Anfängliche), harder (schwerer) to think [finitude as thnētos]

HDG.EC.content: in waiting we let things into where we ourselves belong, in rest (i.e. in return to themselves) > things, once returning as such, bring their own presence (Gegenwart) from themselves toward (entgegen) us, they fill out the emptiness that seems to gape around us as we wait > by not waiting on this restful repose, by hastening toward progress, humans become pacesetter (Schrittmacher) of devastation
HDG.EC.linkedContent: in waiting we let things into where we ourselves belong, in rest (i.e. in return to themselves) > things, once returning as such, bring their own presence (Gegenwart) from themselves toward (entgegen) us, they fill out the emptiness that seems to gape around us as we wait > by not waiting on this restful repose, by hastening toward progress, humans become pacesetter (Schrittmacher) of devastation

HDG.OHF.content: dialectic has same source in error (Fehlerquelle) of that which it wishes to remedy: steps into already constructed context, though really there’s no context here > what’s missing in dialectic: radical fundamental looking (radikale Grundblick) toward and at object of philosophy, from which (on basis of which), aus dem selbst, the How of what is understood emerges in unity
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: dialectic has same source in error (Fehlerquelle) of that which it wishes to remedy: steps into already constructed context, though really there’s no context here > what’s missing in dialectic: radical fundamental looking (radikale Grundblick) toward and at object of philosophy, from which (on basis of which), aus dem selbst, the How of what is understood emerges in unity

HDG.OHF.content: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: “tarrying among (Verweilen bei)” sustains possibility of actualizing a universal classifying that compares [historical] forms, in it lies relational guarantee that every past culture can be encountered objectively > a constant seeing this & that, can never halt [cf. 45 abode-less tarrying (das aufenthaltslose Verweilen) that holds itself/sojourns in (Aufhalten) what it returns to) > what’s encountered in this Verweilen as universal possibility of expression, divided into unities of style: beings in the How of their having-being, already there [for us to see] (i.e. past is available, is a past present, not our virtuality) > a pull (Zug) arises from the already there (schon da) in the past: world, life, publicness, what was going on [if destruction occurs by thinking Zug outside of Zug of historical consciousness, deconstruction occurs by noting that Zug of historical consciousness never occurs, i.e that everyday facticity has been overdetermined, we were never that close to it]

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

HDG.OHF.content: decisive for development (Ausbildung) of a forehaving: seeing Dasein in its everydayness (Alltäglichkeit) > [cf. p. 62] formal indication of forehaving, in average everydayness: factical life means being-in-a-world > what is meant by “world” by “in” by “being”? investigation of each word not piecemeal but one point of view on same unitary phenomenon [demonstrated in intuition?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: decisive for development (Ausbildung) of a forehaving: seeing Dasein in its everydayness (Alltäglichkeit) > [cf. p. 62] formal indication of forehaving, in average everydayness: factical life means being-in-a-world > what is meant by “world” by “in” by “being”? investigation of each word not piecemeal but one point of view on same unitary phenomenon [demonstrated in intuition?]

HDG.OHF.content: since Parmenides [does his reading of Parmenides change?], “perceptual mean-ing (vernehmendes Vermeinen)” and Being are the same [noien and einai], 1st fundamental insight (Grundeinsicht) of idealism (traditional ontology/logic stand w/in the fate of Parmenidean interpretation) (no accident Husserl still characterizing intentionality as “noetic”) > recovering (Gewinnung) a primordial situation presupposes critique of development of intellectual history
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: since Parmenides [does his reading of Parmenides change?], “perceptual mean-ing (vernehmendes Vermeinen)” and Being are the same [noien and einai], 1st fundamental insight (Grundeinsicht) of idealism (traditional ontology/logic stand w/in the fate of Parmenidean interpretation) (no accident Husserl still characterizing intentionality as “noetic”) > recovering (Gewinnung) a primordial situation presupposes critique of development of intellectual history
